column4: I have Sony ux280p. It's UMPC with touch screen. To get touch screen work I need create xorg.conf. But after I create automatically and run it for test nothing happen just black screen. What can I do to fix this?
it sounds like you Xorg of misconfigured, revisit your config and see if you got all the settings right
Is there a way to look log file? For X server.
the xorg log can be found at /var/log/Xorg.0.log
